title: How Many Legs?
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 41 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: While most familiar land animals have legs, they don't all have the same number. This book introduces students to the different numbers of legs that animals use to get around, from two to too many to count. Clear photographs accompany the text for reinforcement of counting skills.
meta: animals, eight, four, legs, many, six, ten, two
